00005 import java.io.File;
00006 import java.io.IOException;
00007 import java.io.PrintStream;
00008 import java.sql.Connection;
00009 import java.sql.Driver;
00010 import java.util.ArrayList;
00011 import java.util.Properties;
00012 import java.util.logging.Formatter;
00013 import java.util.logging.Handler;
00014 import java.util.logging.LogRecord;
00015 import java.util.logging.SimpleFormatter;
00016 
00017 import javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException;
00018 
00019 import liquibase.database.Database;
00020 import liquibase.database.DatabaseFactory;
00021 import liquibase.database.HibernateDatabase;
00022 import liquibase.diff.Diff;
00023 import liquibase.diff.DiffResult;
00024 import liquibase.diff.DiffStatusListener;
00025 import liquibase.exception.JDBCException;
00026 import liquibase.exception.MigrationFailedException;
00027 import liquibase.log.LogFactory;
00028 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;

00036 public class CommandLineUtils {
00037 
00038     public static Database createDatabaseObject(ClassLoader classLoader,
00039                                                 String url,
00040                                                 String username,
00041                                                 String password,
00042                                                 String driver,
00043                                                 String defaultSchemaName,
00044                                                 String databaseClass) throws JDBCException {
00045         if (driver == null) {
00046             driver = DatabaseFactory.getInstance().findDefaultDriver(url);
00047         }
00048 
00049         try {
00050             if (url.startsWith("hibernate:")) {
00051                 try {
00052                     return (Database) Class.forName(HibernateDatabase.class.getName(), true, classLoader).getConstructor(String.class).newInstance(url.substring("hibernate:".length()));
00053                 } catch (NoClassDefFoundError e) {
00054                     throw new MigrationFailedException(null, "Class " + e.getMessage() + " not found.  Make sure all required Hibernate and JDBC libraries are in your classpath");
00055                 }
00056             }
00057 
00058             Driver driverObject;
00059             DatabaseFactory databaseFactory = DatabaseFactory.getInstance();
00060             if (databaseClass != null) {
00061                 databaseFactory.addDatabaseImplementation((Database) Class.forName(databaseClass, true, classLoader).newInstance());
00062             }
00063 
00064             try {
00065                 if (driver == null) {
00066                     driver = databaseFactory.findDefaultDriver(url);
00067                 }
00068 
00069                 if (driver == null) {
00070                     throw new RuntimeException("Driver class was not specified and could not be determined from the url (" + url + ")");
00071                 }
00072 
00073                 driverObject = (Driver) Class.forName(driver, true, classLoader).newInstance();
00074             } catch (Exception e) {
00075                 throw new RuntimeException("Cannot find database driver: " + e.getMessage());
00076             }
00077             Properties info = new Properties();
00078             if (username != null) {
00079                 info.put("user", username);
00080             }
00081             if (password != null) {
00082                 info.put("password", password);
00083             }
00084 
00085             Connection connection = driverObject.connect(url, info);
00086             if (connection == null) {
00087                 throw new JDBCException("Connection could not be created to " + url + " with driver " + driver.getClass().getName() + ".  Possibly the wrong driver for the given database URL");
00088             }
00089 
00090             Database database = databaseFactory.findCorrectDatabaseImplementation(connection);
00091             database.setDefaultSchemaName(StringUtils.trimToNull(defaultSchemaName));
00092             return database;
00093         } catch (Exception e) {
00094             throw new JDBCException(e);
00095         }
00096     }
00097 
00098     public static void doDiff(Database baseDatabase, Database targetDatabase) throws JDBCException {
00099         Diff diff = new Diff(baseDatabase, targetDatabase);
00100         diff.addStatusListener(new OutDiffStatusListener());
00101         DiffResult diffResult = diff.compare();
00102 
00103         System.out.println("");
00104         System.out.println("Diff Results:");
00105         diffResult.printResult(System.out);
00106     }
00107 
00108     public static void doDiffToChangeLog(String changeLogFile,
00109                                          Database baseDatabase,
00110                                          Database targetDatabase)
00111             throws JDBCException, IOException, ParserConfigurationException {
00112         Diff diff = new Diff(baseDatabase, targetDatabase);
00113         diff.addStatusListener(new OutDiffStatusListener());
00114         DiffResult diffResult = diff.compare();
00115 
00116         if (changeLogFile == null) {
00117             diffResult.printChangeLog(System.out, targetDatabase);
00118         } else {
00119             diffResult.printChangeLog(changeLogFile, targetDatabase);
00120         }
00121     }
00122 
00123     public static void doGenerateChangeLog(String changeLogFile, Database originalDatabase, String defaultSchemaName, String diffTypes, String author, String context, String dataDir) throws JDBCException, IOException, ParserConfigurationException {
00124         Diff diff = new Diff(originalDatabase, defaultSchemaName);
00125         diff.setDiffTypes(diffTypes);
00126 
00127         diff.addStatusListener(new OutDiffStatusListener());
00128         DiffResult diffResult = diff.compare();
00129         diffResult.setChangeSetAuthor(author);
00130         diffResult.setChangeSetContext(context);
00131         diffResult.setDataDir(dataDir);
00132 
00133         PrintStream outputStream = System.out;
00134 
00135         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(changeLogFile) != null) {
00136             File changeFile = new File(changeLogFile);
00137             outputStream = new PrintStream(changeFile);
00138         }
00139         diffResult.printChangeLog(outputStream, originalDatabase);
00140     }
00141 
00142     private static class OutDiffStatusListener implements DiffStatusListener {
00143 
00147         private Formatter customFormatter = new Formatter() {
00148             public String format(LogRecord rec) {
00149                 return rec.getMessage() + "\n";
00150             }
00151         };
00152 
00156         private ArrayList<Handler> handList = new ArrayList<Handler>();
00157 
00158 
00165         private void prepareHandlers() {
00166 
00167             if (handList.size() > 0) {
00168                 return;
00169             }
00170 
00171             for (Handler h : LogFactory.getLogger().getParent().getHandlers()) {
00172                 handList.add(h);
00173             }
00174 
00175             for (Handler h : LogFactory.getLogger().getHandlers()) {
00176                 handList.add(h);
00177             }
00178 
00179         } // end of method prepareHandlers
00180 
00187         private void setCustomFormatter() {
00188             Object[] arrHandlers = handList.toArray();
00189             for (int i = 0; i < arrHandlers.length; i++) {
00190                 Handler h = (Handler) arrHandlers[i];
00191                 h.setFormatter(customFormatter);
00192             }
00193         } // end of method setCustomFormatter()
00194 
00201         private void restoreSimpleFormatter() {
00202             Object[] arrHandlers = handList.toArray();
00203             for (int i = 0; i < arrHandlers.length; i++) {
00204                 Handler h = (Handler) arrHandlers[i];
00205                 h.setFormatter(new SimpleFormatter());
00206             }
00207         } // end of method restoreSimpleFormatter()
00208 
00215         public void statusUpdate(String message) {
00216 
00217             // Prepare
00218             prepareHandlers();
00219             setCustomFormatter();
00220 
00221             // Log message
00222             LogFactory.getLogger().info(message);
00223 
00224             // Cleanup
00225             restoreSimpleFormatter();
00226 
00227         } // end of method statusUpdate
00228 
00229     } // end of class OutDiffStatusListener
00230 
00231 }
